name: snikket
tagline: A private messaging server for families and groups
description: Snikket Server is a self-hosted XMPP-based messaging server aimed at family and small groups. It pairs with mobile clients to provide private chat, group messaging, and voice calls.

features.title: Data Privacy
features.description: Encrypts messages with OMEMO for privacy

features.title: End-to-End Encryption
features.description: Creates encrypted group conversations with multiple participants

features.title: Voice And Video Calls
features.description: Supports encrypted audio and video calling

features.title: File Sharing
features.description: Sends photos, videos, and files through encrypted channels

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Native iOS and Android apps with push notifications
